channel.title: Directions on Welcome! A place where ancient architecture 'Vastu' meets modern Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning!

item.title: 16 Directions or 32 Directions?
item.description: Most important aspect of Vastu Directions Directions are the most important aspect of Vastu. Each direction presents opportunity for either spiritual, economic, social or in some other form. There are primary 4 directions: North, South, East and West – called cardinal directions, while there are sub-directions such as: North East, South East, North West, South West. Each sub-directions get their fair share such as – North-NorthEast(NNE), North-NorthWest(NNW), East-NorthEast(ENE), East-SouthEast(ESE), South-SouthEast(SSE), South-SouthWest (SSW), West-NorthWest(WNW), North-NorthWest(NNW)
